managers
 

  • Uses of CustomerAcc in managers

    Methods in managers that return CustomerAcc
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CustomerAcc
    CustomerAccManager.createAcc(List<Account> accountList)
    Function to create new user account Asks user for username and checks if username already exist in the list of accounts Ask user for email and checks if email entered is a valid email address using pre-defined regex function in accountManager class Ask user for mobile number and check if mobile number entered is a valid number using pre-defined regex function in accountManager class Ask user for age and check if age is valid Ask user for password and check if password is strong using function in utils/PasswordStrengthChecker class After getting information, all the information will be stored in acc and appended to the csv file with the list of accounts
